script.name: plugin.guilds.createbounty
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds' $tGuildData = get global variable: name='guilds.data'
if not $tGuild $tGuild = $tGuildData['bounty'] end
$guild.level = $tGuild['level']
* dont create bounties too quickly $current.time = playing time $last.time = $tGuild['last'] if $last.time if ( $last.time + 600 ) > $current.time return null end end
$tBounties = $tGuild['bounties'] if not $tBounties $tBounties = table alloc $tGuild['bounties'] = $tBounties end
* all valid races for bounties $tBountyRaces = table alloc $tBountyRaces[Argon] = [TRUE] $tBountyRaces[Boron] = [TRUE] $tBountyRaces[Paranid] = [TRUE] $tBountyRaces[Split] = [TRUE] $tBountyRaces[Teladi] = [TRUE] $tBountyRaces[Pirates] = [TRUE] $tBountyRaces[Terran] = [TRUE] $tBountyRaces[Yaki] = [TRUE]
* count how many bounties per race $table = table alloc $key = get next key: table=$tBounties key=null while $key $bounty = $tBounties[$key] $bounty.race = $bounty['race'] $amt = $table[$bounty.race] skip if $amt $amt = 0 inc $amt = $table[$bounty.race] = $amt
$key = get next key: table=$tBounties key=$key end
* remove races that have too many bounties $bounty.race = get next key: table=$table key=null while $bounty.race $amt = $table[$bounty.race] do if $amt >= $a.max remove key $bounty.race from table $tBountyRaces $bounty.race = get next key: table=$table key=$bounty.race end
* pick a random race to create a bounty for $bounty.race = get random key: table=$tBountyRaces
* create the new bounty $kingdom.end = get global variable: name='main.universe' skip if $kingdom.end -> exists $kingdom.end = get sector from universe index: x=0, y=0
$sector = find a random sector: startsector=$kingdom.end, jumps=100, owner=$bounty.race if $sector -> exists $aClasses = array alloc: size=17 $aClasses[0] = M5 $aClasses[1] = M5 $aClasses[2] = M4 $aClasses[3] = M4 $aClasses[4] = M4 $aClasses[5] = M3 $aClasses[6] = M3 if $tGuild < 2 $aClasses[7] = M5 $aClasses[8] = M5 $aClasses[9] = M5 $aClasses[10] = M5 $aClasses[11] = M5 $aClasses[12] = M5 else $aClasses[7] = M3 $aClasses[8] = M3 $aClasses[9] = M3 $aClasses[10] = M6 $aClasses[11] = TM $aClasses[12] = TP end $aClasses[13] = TP $aClasses[13] = TS $aClasses[14] = TS $aClasses[15] = TS $aClasses[16] = TS
$tries = 10 while $tries dec $tries = $class = get random array item: array=$aClasses $ship.type = get random ship type: class=$class race=$bounty.race $main.type = get maintype of ware $ship.type do if $main.type == [SSTYPE_SHIP] break end
$main.type = get maintype of ware $ship.type if $main.type == [SSTYPE_SHIP] $station = find station: sector=$sector class or type=null race=null flags=[Find.Random] refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null if $station -> exists $ship = create ship: type=$ship.type owner=$bounty.race addto=$station x=0 y=0 z=0 else $pos = create new array, size=4, elements=0, 0, 0, $sector, null, null, null, null $gate = find gate: flags=[Find.Random], refobj=null, max dist=500000, refpos=$pos if $gate -> exists $x = $gate -> get x position $y = $gate -> get y position $z = $gate -> get z position $ship = create ship: type=$ship.type owner=$bounty.race addto=$sector x=$x y=$y z=$z end end if $ship -> exists $ship ->add default items to ship $race.text = 5100 if $bounty.race == Pirates $race.text = $ship -> get owner race if $race.text == Argon $race.text = 5100 else if $race.text == Boron $race.text = 5200 else if $race.text == Paranid $race.text = 5400 else if $race.text == Split $race.text = 5300 else if $race.text == Teladi $race.text = 5500 end else if $bounty.race == Argon $race.text = 5100 else if $bounty.race == Boron $race.text = 5200 else if $bounty.race == Paranid $race.text = 5400 else if $bounty.race == Split $race.text = 5300 else if $bounty.race == Teladi $race.text = 5500 else if $bounty.race == Terran $race.text = 5600 else if $bounty.race == Yaki $race.text = 5700 end
$pilot.name = $ship -> get pilot name $pilot.voice = $ship ->get pilot voice $pilot.face = $ship ->get pilot face $speaker = $ship ->create pilot speaker: name=$pilot.name, race=$bounty.race, voice=$pilot.voice, face=$pilot.face
$tBounty = table alloc $tBounty['pilot'] = $speaker * Bounty type, 1=any, 2=kill, 3=capture, 4=Assassinate if $a.type $tBounty['type'] = $a.type else $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd < 50 $tBounty['type'] = 1 else if $rnd < 80 $tBounty['type'] = 2 else $tBounty['type'] = 3 end * if they cant bail, always have a kill if $ship -> is of class Big Ship if not $ship -> is of class M8 $tBounty['type'] = 2 end end end
$price.add = 0 $bounty.type = $tBounty['type'] if $bounty.type == 3 $ship ->set always bail flag: [TRUE] $price.add = 200000 end
if $bounty.type != 4 $ship ->set owner race to Unknown end
$ship ->set override name flags: 64 $rnd = random value from 0 to 19 - 1 $race.text = $race.text + $rnd $ship -> set job override name: $race.text
$rnd = random value from 3 to 5 - 1 $tBounty['range'] = $rnd
$wingmen = 0 $price.rnd = 0 if $ship -> is of class M3 $price.min = 500000 $price.max = 1000000 $level.min = 2 $level.max = 4 else if $ship -> is of class M4 $level.min = 0 $level.max = 3 $price.min = 200000 $price.max = 500000 else if $ship -> is of class M6 $level.min = 2 $level.max = 5 $price.min = 1000000 $price.max = 3500000 else if $ship -> is of class TM $wingmen = 4 $level.min = 2 $level.max = 6 $price.min = 2000000 $price.max = 5000000 else if $ship -> is of class TP $level.min = 0 $level.max = 3 $price.min = 400000 $price.max = 1000000 else if $ship -> is of class TS $price.min = 300000 $price.max = 1000000 $level.min = 0 $level.max = 2 else $price.min = 100000 $price.max = 300000 $level.min = 0 $level.max = 1 end
skip if $price.rnd $price.rnd = $price.min $vari = $ship -> get ship variation if $vari == [Vari.HeavyTransport] OR $vari == [Vari.ArmouredTransport] OR $vari == [Vari.Plus] inc $level.min = inc $level.max = $price.min = $price.min + ( $price.min / 5 ) $price.max = $price.max + ( $price.max / 5 ) end
if $level.max > $guild.level if $level.min > $guild.level $level.max = $level.min else $level.max = $guild.level end end $level = $level.max + 1 $level = random value from $level.min to $level - 1
$price = linear interpolation: x1=$level.min, x2=$level.max, y1=$price.min, y2=$price.max, value=$level $rnd = random value from 0 to $price.rnd - 1 $price = $price + $rnd + $price.add do if $wingmen $wingmen = linear interpolation: x1=$level.min, x2=$level.max, y1=0, y2=$wingmen, value=$level
$xp = ( $level + 1 ) * 35 $xp.max = ( $level + 1 ) * 60 $xp = random value from $xp to $xp.max - 1 $tBounty['xp'] = $xp $tBounty['pay'] = $price $tBounty['level'] = $level $tBounty['guild'] = $tGuild['nameid']
$tGuild['last'] = $current.time $owner = $sector -> get owner race if $owner == Argon OR $owner == TerraCorp OR $owner == OTAS OR $owner == Terran OR $owner == ATF OR $owner == Darkspace if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 $author = get random name: race=$owner, female=[FALSE] else $author = get random name: race=$owner, female=[TRUE] end else $author = get random name: race=$owner, female=[FALSE] end $tBounty['author'] = $author $tBounty['gov'] = $owner $tBounty['sector'] = $sector $tBounty['ship'] = $ship $tBounty['race'] = $bounty.race $tBounty['created'] = $current.time
$tBounties[$ship] = $tBounty
$id = 1300 gosub sub.GetText if $text if $bounty.type == 4 $old.text = $text $id = 1400 gosub sub.GetText $text = $old.text + ' ' + $text end
$tBounty['story'] = $text $id = 1500 gosub sub.GetText if $text $tBounty['story.seen'] = $text end if $bounty.type == 4 OR $bounty.type == 2 $id = 1700 else if $bounty.type == 3 $id = 1800 else $id = 1600 end gosub sub.GetText if $text $tBounty['story.pay'] = $text end end
$text = convert number $price to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $price, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $speaker ->set passenger info: id='bounty.pay' pageid=$page.id textid=1014 info=$text $text = convert number $xp to string $speaker ->set passenger info: id='bounty.xp' pageid=$page.id textid=1016 info=$text $task = $ship -> get next available task: starting=[Task.StartCustom] $ship ->start task $task with script plugin.guilds.bounty.watch and prio 100: arg1=$tBounty arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null @ START $ship -> call script plugin.guilds.bounty.move : Bounty Data=$tBounty end end end return null
sub.GetText: if read text: page id=$page.id, id=$id exists $text = read text: page=$page.id id=$id $text = string $text to integer if $text > 0 $text = random value from 0 to $text - 1 $text = $id + 1 + $text if read text: page id=$page.id, id=$text exists $text = read text: page=$page.id id=$text gosub sub.ReplaceVars endsub end end end $text = null endsub
sub.ReplaceVars: $var = $tBounty['pilot'] $var = $var -> get name $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::PILOT::' with $var $var = $tBounty['race'] $var = sprintf: fmt='%s', $var, null, null, null, null $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::RACE::' with $var $var = $tBounty['gov'] $var = sprintf: fmt='%s', $var, null, null, null, null $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::GOV::' with $var $var = $tBounty['sector'] $var = $var -> get name $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::SECTOR::' with $var $var = $tBounty['ship'] $var = $var -> get name $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::SHIP::' with $var $var = $tBounty['ship'] $var = $var -> get ID code $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::SHIPCODE::' with $var $var = $tBounty['author'] $var = sprintf: fmt='%s', $var, null, null, null, null $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::AUTHOR::' with $var $var = $tBounty['guild'] $var = $tGuildData[$var]['name'] $var = read text: page=$page.id id=$var $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::GUILD::' with $var $var = $tBounty['pay'] $var = convert number $var to string $text = substitute in string $text: pattern '::PAY::' with $var endsub return null

comment.var: count how many bounties per race
remove races that have too many bounties
pick a random race to create a bounty for

line.text: get sector from universe index: x=

comment.var: if they cant bail, always have a kill

sval.val: count how many bounties per race
remove races that have too many bounties
pick a random race to create a bounty for
if they cant bail, always have a kill
